name: pouchdb-adapter-capacitor-sqlite
description: PouchDB adapter using Capacitor SQLite Plugin as its data store.
author: Josh Pike <pikatore@gmail.com>

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify -s PouchAdapterCapacitorSqlite -p bundle-collapser/plugin . > dist/pouchdb.capacitor-sqlite.js && uglifyjs -mc < dist/pouchdb.capacitor-sqlite.js > dist/pouchdb.capacitor-sqlite.min.js
